name: Comit the Astrodian 2
description: Comit the Astrodian 2 is the sequel to 2016's Comit the Astrodian. It features new stages, new abilities and new enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 Ghz Memory: 120 MB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 10 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
